x=input()
for i in range(x):
    y=input()
    ln=[]
    
    d=dict()
    for j in range(y):
        n=raw_input()
        st=n.split()
        name=st[0]
        sc=int(st[1])
        
        if name in ln:
            
            new=d[name]+sc
            
            d[name]=new
        else:
            d[name]=sc
            ln.append(name)
            
    max=0
    for i in ln:
         if d[i]>max:
             max=d[i]
             name=i
    print name+" "+str(max)
